Start organizing your thoughts, ideas, and tasks all in one place. Tap the + button to create your first note!

What would you like to do?

Note It is your personal space for capturing thoughts and managing daily tasks effortlessly. Developed as the final project for CSIT284 - Platform Based Development (Mobile), this app helps you create detailed notes and simple to-do lists to keep everything organized. We hope Note It helps streamline your thoughts and tasks effectively.
